message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a price that I think is fair, considering its value to you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but that price is a bit high for me. Would you consider $850,000?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. However, I have to consider my minimum price to ensure I get a fair return on my investment. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need $1,100,000 to be comfortable selling the product to you.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice. How about we settle on $950,000? That feels like a fair compromise to me.
I'm glad we're close, Bob, but I still need to get a good return on my investment. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need $1,050,000 to feel comfortable selling the product to you.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  To be honest, $1,000,000 is the absolute highest I can go.  If you can't do that, I'll have to explore other options.

I understand you're at your limit, Bob, but I still need to get as much as I can for the product. I'm willing to meet you at $1,050,000, but I need to make it worth my while. I'll throw in some additional support and services to sweeten the deal.
